wikipedia_page.main: James William Richards (May 31, 1850 – March 9, 1915) was a businessman, ship-owner and politician in Canada.  From 1873 to 1908 he represented 2nd Prince in the Legislative Assembly of Prince Edward Island, Canada, as a Conservative and then Liberal member. From 1908 to 1915 he represented Prince County in the House of Commons of Canada as a Liberal member.
